title: Always fortunate
excerpt: Ralph Waldo Emerson advised "...give thanks continuously. And because all things have contributed to your advancement...include all things in your gratitude."

children.text: Ralph Waldo Emerson advised "...give thanks continuously. And because all things have contributed to your advancement...include all things in your gratitude."
Because today and everyday we all have something to be thankful for.
Some reason to be happy or to find hope. Even in the smallest of things.
Life's not perfect, hardly. But by regularly acknowledging (and appreciating) what makes it great, we can at least learn to see the upside amidst all that's down.
